actions.committee: Senate Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation.

official_title: A bill to authorize the transfer of a vessel by the Secretary of Commerce to the Superior-Douglas County Museum for use as a maritime museum.

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of Commerce to transfer, without reimbursement, the title and ownership of V4- M-A1 ocean tug Scotch Cap to the Superior-Douglas County Museum in Superior, Wisconsin, for use as a maritime museum. Declares that the vessel, while owned by the Museum, shall be used solely as a maritime museum.

titles.title: A bill to authorize the transfer of a vessel by the Secretary of Commerce to the Superior-Douglas County Museum for use as a maritime museum.
